comments.body: I would prefer this do be done before, could we move this requirements in ./test/runner/requirements/integration.cloud.vcenter.txt ?

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +64,68 @@# Install TOML for --toml
${PYTHON} -m pip freeze | grep toml > /dev/null 2>&1
if [ $? -ne 0 ]; then
    echo "Installing TOML package"
    ${PYTHON} -m pip install toml
